Key Match Events: Jayson Tatum recorded a triple-double with 35 points, 15 rebounds, and 12 assists
Kristaps Porzingis led the team with 31 points and had a season-best game
Pre-Game Insights: The Nuggets were without Nikola Jokic due to illness
Post-Match Reflections: Kristaps Porzingis expressed pride in his team's effort after the comeback win
Coach Joe Mazzulla highlighted the victory as a crucial step toward the championship
Miscellaneous Highlights: A power outage delayed the game by 30 minutes
